title.en: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha - my home, my love (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: my home, my love (Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha)

biography.en:
Doujin circle specializing in GL parody works.

**Native name**: めきめき王国

**Members**: 
[Mekimeki](https://mangadex.org/author/2a155603-7d75-4959-8146-005d8c9559e7) (duo)

Mekimeki (めきめき) is a Japanese manga artist duo that consists of Kurashiki (倉式; also known as Kagekatsu, 景勝) and Teruko (てる子; also known as Tsunpun, つんぷん). Kurashiki Teruko (倉式てる子) is an alias for this duo which combines the names of both artists.

**Native name**: めきめき

**Circle(s)**: [Mekimeki Oukoku](https://mangadex.org/author/04fcf56b-14bd-40b4-9f71-7fbcf18b8871) (めきめき王国), [Mekimekitei](https://mangadex.org/author/98d56534-5cd4-4a66-86a7-1c74d78997ab) (めきめき亭)

**Alt. names**:
Meki Meki
Kagekatsu
Kagekatu
Kurashiki
Kurashiki Teruko
Teruko
Tsunpun
